downloadTitle: Hotfixes for Surface Drivers and Firmware
downloadDescription: All current drivers, firmware and hotfixes for Surface devices
detailsSection:
Cumulative and current drivers, firmware and hotfixes for the Surface devices. The driver MSI files include all of the drivers and firmware needed to deploy custom images of Windows on your Surface devices.
    The "Date Published" represents the last time this page was updated, so the file you are downloading may be older than the actual "Date Published".

Surface update history
systemRequirementsSection: A compatible Surface device is required for these drivers. These drivers, firmware and hotfixes are compatible with Windows 10, including Enterprise versions.
installInstructionSection: Use these drivers and firmware to prepare your custom images for enterprise deployment, or to repair problems with custom installations of Windows on your Surface device. The MSI will install all relevant drivers automatically.
